author: Special Correspondent
text:
The interim budget of the State for the year 2016-17 would be presented by the State government on February 16 in the Legislative Assembly.

It would possibly be the last session of the current Legislative Assembly before Tamil Nadu goes to the elections this summer.

“The Speaker has called for the next session of the Legislative Assembly at 11 a.m. on February 16. The interim budget for the year 2016-17 would be presented at 11 a.m. on that day,” Assembly Secretary A.M.P. Jamaludeen announced in a statement.

Presently, the House has 234 elected members and a nominated member, following the resignation of former All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam legislator Pala. Karuppiah, who also levelled allegations against the functioning of the government.
title: Interim budget to be presented on February 16
